sentence.Network_en: Objective: To survey the resource of Alternanthera philoxeroides and discrepancy in quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要目的: 了解空心莲子草资源分布及品质差异情况.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Alternanthera philoxeroidesare rich in natural resources and the quality is effected notably by ecological environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 空心莲子草植物资源丰富,其品质具有显著的生态地域性差异.

sentence.Network_en: The results show that Alternanthera philoxeroides had no significant effect on reducing salinity and alkalinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 浮萍的降盐效果也不明显,但其降碱效果较明显.
